widgetDescription: A widget to perform traces in a Utility Network.

inputsStrings.startingPointHint: Add starting points for the trace.
inputsStrings.barrierPointHint: Add barrier points for the trace.
inputsStrings.addPointHint: Click the map to add a point

resultsStrings.startOverValidation: Are you sure? All the trace Inputs and Results will be lost.
resultsStrings.noSelectionResults: Features cannot be selected. Enable to show graphics instead.

alertsStrings.startingPointAlert: Add a starting point to run this trace.
alertsStrings.selectTraceAlert: Select a trace type to run.
alertsStrings.noResultsInfo: Go to the Inputs tab to select a trace type, add a starting point, and click Run to view the results.
alertsStrings.noAssetFound: The point must intersect with a feature on the map.
alertsStrings.clearResultsAlert: Are you sure? All the results for this trace will be discarded.
alertsStrings.noTraceSupported: This map does not support tracing the Utility Network. Publish a web map with a Utility Network and shared Trace Configurations.
alertsStrings.noUserExtension: The account logged in is missing a license for the ArcGIS Utility Network user type extension.
